title: National Security Issues: Ukraine, ISIS And Yemen
teaser: Jim Walsh, an expert in international security, discusses the global threats and crises in the news.
contentencoded:
With Ukraine, Yemen, and ISIS dominating the news, there are plenty of national security issues facing the United States right now. Here & Now’s Robin Young checks in our security analyst Jim Walsh.

Guest

  • Jim Walsh, Here & Now security analyst and an expert in international security at MITâ€™s Security Studies Program. He tweets @DrJimWalshMIT.
